Layer.TextAMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtdt_A then vtdt_A:hidden(0) vtdt_A:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) vtdt_A:zoomy(0) vtdt_A:bounceend(spb*1.5) vtdt_A:zoomy(1) vtdt_A:sleep(spb*18) vtdt_A:linear(spb*1.5) vtdt_A:diffusealpha(0) vtdt_A:queuecommand('HideSelf') end end

Layer.TextMMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtdt_M then vtdt_M:hidden(0) vtdt_M:cropright(1) vtdt_M:faderight(1) vtdt_M:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) vtdt_M:linear(spb*10) vtdt_M:cropright(0) vtdt_M:faderight(0) vtdt_M:sleep(0) vtdt_M:queuecommand('came') vtdt_M:sleep(spb*2) vtdt_M:linear(spb*4) vtdt_M:zoom(0) vtdt_M:rotationz(159) vtdt_M:rotationy(-159) vtdt_M:queuecommand('HideSelf') end end

Layer.TextRMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtdt_R then vtdt_R:hidden(0) vtdt_R:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) vtdt_R:zoom(0) vtdt_R:bounceend(spb*1.5) vtdt_R:zoom(1) vtdt_R:sleep(spb*10) vtdt_R:zoom(0) vtdt_R:queuecommand('HideSelf') end end

Layer.TextDismissMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtdt_dismiss then vtdt_dismiss:hidden(0) vtdt_dismiss:zoom(0) vtdt_dismiss:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.3) vtdt_dismiss:bounceend(spb*1) vtdt_dismiss:zoom(2) vtdt_dismiss:sleep(spb*1.15) vtdt_dismiss:accelerate(spb*1) vtdt_dismiss:zoom(0) vtdt_dismiss:queuecommand('HideSelf') end end
